alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and northwestern Taylor Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Perry, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scanlon, Econfina, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre and Cabbage Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor
